transcription.text: Hello, good morning. Magandang umaga po. Elizabeth Espinosa.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hello po, connected na po yung line, Ms. Elizabeth Espinosa. Hello. Hello po. Yes ma'am, kayo na po ito, ma'am, Ms. Elizabeth Espinosa.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ma'am, over the recorded line po, for security purposes, si Ms. Grace po ito, financial officer po ng AMG, on behalf of Maya. Pakonfirm po ng last four digit number na gamit niya kay Maya, 9632, tama po ba? Ma'am, nakapag-settle na po ba kay Maya? One hundred...
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Wala pa, ma'am. Inintay ko na lang, ma'am. May pera ako, ma'am. May pera ako, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Balik kasi ma'am, one hundred forty days na ho kayong overdue, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay lang po. Okay lang. Kasi may increase pa kayo. May patong na kayo dyan.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Bakit kayo nag-worry kung may patong? Okay lang yan. Maganda pa ako ng pera. Kaya saan mawala ako pera?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Opo ma'am, kasi ma'am, ibig po sabihin, ma'am, yung nanghirap po kayo kay Maya, ma'am, hindi niya po ba naisip, ma'am, paano niya po siya babayaran?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Wala ko na ibigay sa inyo. Okay lang. Okay lang. Ma'am, do not question me about that, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Opo, eh kasi po ma'am, umabot na po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay, ito na lang ma'am, hintayin niyo na lang po ma'am sa inyo, ma'am, yung barangay visitation po ni Maya, ma'am, for legal action na po itong account niya, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Sige na, ma'am. Sige na, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk1

translation.tagalog: Hello, good morning. Magandang umaga po. Elizabeth Espinosa.
translation.english: Good morning, good morning, this is Elizabeth.

translation.tagalog: Hello po, connected na po yung line, Ms. Elizabeth Espinosa. Hello. Hello po. Yes ma'am, kayo na po ito, ma'am, Ms. Elizabeth Espinosa.
translation.english: Hello, this is the line, Ms. Elizabeth Espinosa.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, over the recorded line po, for security purposes, si Ms. Grace po ito, financial officer po ng AMG, on behalf of Maya. Pakonfirm po ng last four digit number na gamit niya kay Maya, 9632, tama po ba? Ma'am, nakapag-settle na po ba kay Maya? One hundred...
translation.english: The first is the Signature section, which is the part of the phone that is used to confirm the last four digits of the phone number of the person you are calling, which is 9676 (Maya).

translation.tagalog: Wala pa, ma'am. Inintay ko na lang, ma'am. May pera ako, ma'am. May pera ako, ma'am.
translation.english: No, ma'am. I'm just waiting, ma'am. I have some money, ma'am. I have some money, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Balik kasi ma'am, one hundred forty days na ho kayong overdue, ma'am.
translation.english: I'm sorry, ma'am, but you've been gone for a hundred and forty days.

translation.tagalog: Okay lang po. Okay lang. Kasi may increase pa kayo. May patong na kayo dyan.
translation.english: Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, what's going on here is that you're going to have an increase, and you're going to have an increase, and you're going to have to have an increase.

translation.tagalog: Bakit kayo nag-worry kung may patong? Okay lang yan. Maganda pa ako ng pera. Kaya saan mawala ako pera?
translation.english: Why do you worry about the money? - I'm fine, I'm good at money, so where do I lose money?

translation.tagalog: Opo ma'am, kasi ma'am, ibig po sabihin, ma'am, yung nanghirap po kayo kay Maya, ma'am, hindi niya po ba naisip, ma'am, paano niya po siya babayaran?
translation.english: Oh, ma'am, I mean, ma'am, the one you're hurting with Maya, ma'am, didn't she think, ma'am, how she'd pay him?

translation.tagalog: Wala ko na ibigay sa inyo. Okay lang. Okay lang. Ma'am, do not question me about that, ma'am.
translation.english: I'm not going to give it to you. Okay. Okay. Ma'am, don't question me about that, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Opo, eh kasi po ma'am, umabot na po.
Okay, ito na lang ma'am, hintayin niyo na lang po ma'am sa inyo, ma'am, yung barangay visitation po ni Maya, ma'am, for legal action na po itong account niya, ma'am.
translation.english: Okay, I'll be right back, ma'am, but I'm going to have to ask you to leave the house, ma'am, and I'm going to have to ask you to leave the house, ma'am, and I'm going to have to ask you to leave the house, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Sige na, ma'am. Sige na, ma'am.
